titleInfo.title: Background information report. Media policies and regulatory practices in a selected set of European countries, the EU and the Council of Europe: The case of Germany

mods.abstract: The research leading to these results has received funding from the European Union Seventh Framework Programme (FP7/2007-2013) under grant agreement FP7-SSH-2009-244365 (MEDIADEM)
